means: 长春新碱（一种抗肿瘤药）

sentence.Network_en: OBJECTIVE To study the physical and chemical stability of vincristine sulfate - blank liposomes.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的考察三瓶装硫酸长春新碱脂质体中空白脂质体的物理、化学稳定性.

sentence.Network_en: FDA approves vincristine, a sister drug to vinblastine.
sentence.Network_cn: 1963年,FDA批准长春花碱的姊妹药,长春新碱.

sentence.Network_en: CONCLUSION It is appropriate a 3 - bottled paekage for vincristine sulfate liposome, and which improves its stability.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论硫酸长春新碱脂质体适合制成三瓶分装制剂, 有利于提高药物稳定性.

其乳汁中所含生物硷，如长春硷和长春新硷（vincristine），被提炼出来作为多种癌症如白血病、淋巴瘤所用的化学治疗药物。纯化的 …

list.abs: therapeutic effect of vincristine on steroid - dependent nephrotic syndrome ., 长春新碱对激素依赖型肾病综合征的治疗.
长春新碱(英语:Vincristine,商品名安可平,又名长春花新碱、新长春碱,医学上简称VCR)是一种由夹竹桃科长春花属植物长春花中提取的一种生物碱。它是一种有丝分裂.
2011年7月25日 - 非霍奇金淋巴瘤的治疗通常采用几种不同类型的药物化疗—环磷酰胺、多柔比星、长春新碱和强的松(cyclophosphamide ,doxorubicin, vincristine and prednisone.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1960s: from modern Latin Vinca (see vinca) + a second element perhaps based on crista + -ine

means.word_mean: 1. periwinkle plant derivative used as an antineoplastic drug (trade name Oncovin); used to treat cancer of the lymphatic system
